response.overview: Like a 'Sidewinder' -- a rattlesnake hypnotically moving through the sands of the desert looking for prey -- these 'snakes' are waiting to strike and claim their prize: a fiery fuck under the hot sun. With his cinematic eye and expert sexual direction, Hall of Famer Steve Cruz leads these six hung cowboys through the desert to an oasis of climax in 'Sidewinder.'  Head out to the desert and find a pack of big, meaty 'Sidewinder' that satisfies.
response.title: Sidewinder
